title: Doc the Destroyer  for ZX Spectrum 48/128
creator_credit: Geoff Evans, Paul Kidd, Melbourne House and Beam Software
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover and manual booklet in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Doc the Destroyer [computer game]. Doc the Destroyer is a side view, strategy arcade adventure in a post apocalyptic setting for one player. At the start of the game, players are given 60 points which they can distribute between five statistics Strength, Endurance, Intelligence, Luck and Charisma. As Doc, players are presented with various choices that determine your next action and some will throw the player into arcade styled combat.
